topics.body:
When I die, I want someone to make a 30-minute anime about my life with some comedy.
And the ending depicts me walking towards a sunset, looking back once and smiling, then resume walking.
The credits has "this":https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FZ-HkqQMbr4 as the theme and just shows me walking left with a little head bobbing.
